Headline: Linden-bound Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays  following an earlier single train delay at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier single train delay at Howard. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses have been requested from Howard to Linden to provide connecting service through the affected area until 4:30pm.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
